problem_data.title: Degree of an Array
problem_data.description:
Given a non-empty array of non-negative integers nums, the degree of this array is defined as the maximum frequency of any one of its elements.

Your task is to find the smallest possible length of a (contiguous) subarray of nums, that has the same degree as nums.

examples.explanation: The input array has a degree of 2 because both elements 1 and 2 appear twice.\nOf the subarrays that have the same degree: [1, 2, 2, 3, 1], [1, 2, 2, 3], [2, 2, 3, 1], [1, 2, 2], [2, 2, 3], [2, 2].\nThe shortest length is 2. So return 2.
The degree is 3 because the element 2 is repeated 3 times.\nSo [2,2,3,1,4,2] is the shortest subarray, therefore returning 6.

experiment_result.runlog:
[測試#1] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findShortestSubArray((1, 2, 2, 3, 1),)
  標準輸出: 2
  你的輸出: 2

[測試#2] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findShortestSubArray((1, 2, 3, 4, 5),)
  標準輸出: 1
  你的輸出: 1

[測試#3] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findShortestSubArray((2, 2, 2, 2),)
  標準輸出: 4
  你的輸出: 4

[測試#4] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findShortestSubArray((1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3),)
  標準輸出: 4
  你的輸出: 4

[測試#5] ❌ 執行例外: 'int' object is not iterable
[測試#6] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findShortestSubArray((0, 1, 2, 0, 3),)
  標準輸出: 4
  你的輸出: 4

[測試#7] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findShortestSubArray((1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1),)
  標準輸出: 7
  你的輸出: 7

[測試#8] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findShortestSubArray((1, 2, 2, 3, 3, 1),)
  標準輸出: 2
  你的輸出: 2

[測試#9] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findShortestSubArray((1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 1),)
  標準輸出: 6
  你的輸出: 6

[測試#10] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: findShortestSubArray((1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 1),)
  標準輸出: 7
  你的輸出: 7

=== 測試完成 (9/10) ===
